properties.entry: SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRICE , THUMB_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY = '주식'
SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRICE , THUMB_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY = '건조간식'
SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRICE , THUMB_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY = '오븐간식'
SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRICE , THUMB_IMG FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY = 'PARTY'
SELECT PRO_NO , PRO_NAME , PRICE , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRO_ATT A ON P.PRO_NO=A.PRO_NO
